---
title: "CheckAction"
description: "Check a checkbox"
---

Use `True` to check, `False` to uncheck.

**Example:**
```python
session.execute(type="check", id="terms-checkbox", value=True)
session.execute(type="check", id="newsletter-checkbox", value=False)
```
